abstract: Mail.ru Group, a Russian Internet company with stakes in Facebook Inc. and Zynga Game Network, is seeking as much as $876 million in an initial public offering in London, Bloomberg News reports.
snippet: Mail.ru Group, a Russian Internet company with stakes in Facebook Inc. and Zynga Game Network, is seeking as much as $876 million in an initial public offering in London, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: Mail.ru Group, a Russian Internet company with stakes in Facebook and Zynga Game Network, is seeking as much as $876 million in an initial public offering in London, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Facebook Shareholder Mail.ru in $876 Million I.P.O.
